cc.mallet.fst.confidence
Class GammaProductConfidenceEstimator

java.lang.Object
  cc.mallet.fst.confidence.TransducerConfidenceEstimator
      cc.mallet.fst.confidence.GammaProductConfidenceEstimator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GammaProductConfidenceEstimator
extends TransducerConfidenceEstimator

Calculates the confidence in an extracted segment by taking the product of eP(s_i|o) for each state in the segment.

See Also:
